Kemendikbud Libatkan 22 Perguruan Tinggi untuk Susun Soal CPNS
07 Nov 2019, 11:25 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Kemendikbud Libatkan 22 Perguruan Tinggi untuk Susun Soal CPNS

KBRN, Jakarta : Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan melibatkan sebanyak 22 perguruan tinggi untuk menyusun soal ujian seleksi calon pegawai negeri sipil (CPNS) 2019."Kami dari Kemendikbud, sebagai panitia seleksi nasional (panselnas) ditugaskan membuat soal, dan kami melibatkan 22 PT karena soal tersebut juga mempertimbangkan kewilayahan," kata Sekjen Kemendikbud Didik Suhardi dilansir dari Antara, Rabu (7/11/2019).Soal yang dibuat, kata dia, memuat tes tentang wawasan kebangsaan, intelegensi umum dan karakteristik pribadi."Terkait rumpun keilmuan soal, perlu dilakukan koordinasi, karena itu kami akan segera mengundang beberapa perguruan tinggi untuk menyepakati rumpun keilmuan," katanya.Penyelarasan rumpun keilmuan, menurut dia bertujuanÂ  membantu para panitia di berbagai tingkatan agar tidak melakukan interpretasi sesuai pendapat masing-masing terhadap soal tes.Mengenai upaya menangkal pelamar berpaham radikal lolos menjadi ASN, tim penyusun soal juga telah memasukkan uji tersebut dalam tes wawasan kebangsaan."Untuk memperkuat menangani radikalisasi, perlu juga nantinya di latihan dasar CPNS," demikian Didik Suhardi.

Ministry of Education and Culture Involves 22 Universities to Arrange CPNS Questions
07 Nov 2019, 11:25 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Ministry of Education and Culture Involves 22 Universities to Arrange CPNS Questions

KBRN, Jakarta: The Ministry of Education and Culture involves as many as 22 universities to compile 2019 civil servant candidate selection exam questions. "We are from the Ministry of Education and Culture, as the national selection committee (panselnas) tasked with making questions, and we involve 22 PT because of the questions The issue also considers territoriality, "Secretary General of the Ministry of Education and Culture Didik Suhardi said from Antara on Wednesday (11/07/2019). The questions made, he said, contained tests on national insights, general intelligence and personal characteristics." Related to the scientific family of questions, it is necessary coordinated, therefore we will soon invite several universities to agree on a scientific group, "he said. The alignment of scientific groups, according to him, aims to help the committee at various levels so as not to interpret according to their respective opinions on test questions. Concerning efforts to ward off applicants radical understanding passes to ASN, the question drafting team has also included the test in the national insight test, "To strengthen dealing with radicalization, it is also necessary to later on the basic training of CPNS," said Didik Suhardi.
